app_title.title: App Title
app_title.description: The title of your chatbot app

app_description.title: App Description
app_description.description: A short description of your chatbot
app_description.default: An advanced chatbot solution that can answer questions based on your uploaded documents.

language.title: Language
language.description: The language of your chatbot interface

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Documents can be uploaded after the app is deployed. After deployment, go to the app settings to upload and manage documents.

file_upload.title: Upload Documents
file_upload.description: Upload documents to be used by the chatbot (available after deployment)

content_title.title: Content Title
content_title.description: The title displayed above the chat

welcome_message.title: Welcome Message
welcome_message.description: The initial message from the chatbot
welcome_message.default: Hello! I'm here to help you. What would you like to know about your documents?

input_placeholder.title: Input Placeholder
input_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field

typing_indicator_text.title: Typing Indicator Text
typing_indicator_text.description: Text shown while the AI is generating a response

error_message.title: Error Message
error_message.description: Message shown when an error occurs
error_message.default: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

no_response_text.title: No Response Text
no_response_text.description: Message shown when no response is received
no_response_text.default: No response received. Please try again.

no_documents_message.title: No Documents Message
no_documents_message.description: Message shown when no documents are available
no_documents_message.default: No documents have been uploaded yet. Please upload documents in the admin panel to enable document-based answers.

quick_actions.title: Quick Actions
quick_actions.description: Predefined questions that users can click on

quick_action1.title: Quick Action 1
quick_action1.default: What are the main topics in my documents?

system_prompt.title: System Prompt
system_prompt.description: Instructions that guide how the AI responds. This sets the AI's behavior, tone, and capabilities. For RAG applications, this prompt should instruct the AI to use document context when available and indicate when information isn't found in the documents.
system_prompt.default: You are a helpful, friendly assistant that answers questions based on the provided document context. When answering, use the information from the documents when available. If the answer is not in the documents, say so clearly and provide a general response based on your knowledge.

primary_color.title: Primary Color
primary_color.description: Main color for buttons and accents

documents.ui:description: Note: Document upload is only available after deployment

file_upload.ui:help: This feature will be available after you deploy the app
